dyad.stats.secondary_mass

Secondary mass (dyad.stats.secondary_mass)

This module contains probability distributions for the secondary masses of a population of binary stars. In its documentation the random variable is denoted \(M_{2}\) and a realization of that random variable is denoted \(m_{2}\). The random variable for secondary mass is conditional on primary mass. The PDF for secondary mass is known as the `pairing function’

Probability distributions

moe2017

The secondary-star mass random variable of Moe and Stefano (2017)

random

The secondary-star mass random variable for random pairing

Classes

moe2017_gen([momtype, a, b, xtol, badvalue, ...])

The secondary-star mass random variable of Moe and Stefano (2017)

random_gen([momtype, a, b, xtol, badvalue, ...])

The secondary-star mass random variable for random pairing
